ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1174
ygData.msgSnippet: Now hold up there. lol, In defense of some of the actual ones that may not be an eBay toon I for one will have to say that as a lvl 42 there are still places I
ygData.messageBody:
Now hold up there. lol, In defense of some of the actual ones that may
not be an eBay toon I for one will have to say that as a lvl 42 there
are still places I have not been to and don't know how to get to. I've
been plying for over 2 years now with the same account I've had since
I've started. I still consider myself a noob and always will be until I
feel that I have accomplished everything that I have wanted to. granted
part of my limited experience is due to the fact I find a place and will
hang out there for a while until I feel that I can move on. I tend to
play solo the majority of the time mostly due to time constraints but it
works for me. I've only been to the dark areas (Gunthak, FoB, and
others) only a couple of times and I still have to ask which stone I
need to take to get there at times! LOL

Durgaa - Member of Mystic Crusaders on Bristlebane
